item.title: University at Buffalo
item.description: BSc in Computer Science August 2000 â€“ August 2003 New York, United States of America Auction site I had the opportunity to work in an e-commerce company in which I developed an auction site using Perl & MySQL. The site was a prototype and was meant to allow consumers to bid for fresh vegetables directly from the farmers. Concurrent bids was something that would typically happen during a bid, in which I developed a simple queue system to help in dealing with conflict bids.
